QuestData.Title: Last Stand of the Moon Guard
QuestData.Description:
This is all that remains of the Moon Guard.
Take a good look.
We are but a shadow of our former selves, and we have the Nightborne to thank for our demise.
For now there is nothing more we can do. If we want to live, we must leave immediately.
Retribution can wait.
QuestData.LogDescription: Leave Moon Guard Stronghold with Thalrenus, Lothrius, and Syrana.
QuestData.RewardText: I called them here. I will see that they are taken care of after the horrors my people put them through.
